title: Book Review: Surely You Can't Be Serious - The True Story of Airplane! ★★⯪☆☆
summary: This is a hugely extended version of Will Harris' "An oral history of Airplane". It goes through the pre-history of the project, how it eventually got made, and the aftermath. In many ways, it is like an old-fashioned DVD extra. The whole book consists of snippets of interviews with the cast, crew, and various talking heads.  Like all DVD special features, it is fairly sycophantic. Yes, there…
